title: Inflation rate in South Sudan 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2024 to 2016.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
gold: This statistic shows the average inflation rate in South Sudan from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , the average inflation rate in South Sudan amounted to about 83.49 percent compared to the previous year .
